note.p: Christened 1 November 1801 at St Luke's Church, Old Street, Finsbury, Middlesex, London
Buried at Christ Church, Trevandrum, Kerala, India
Career: Commercial Agent to the Government of Tranvancore, at the port of Allepey; first Director of the Observatory, Trevandrum, India, where he made observations (1837-1849); died of paralysis
For photograph of headstone by Dr Richard Walding of Griffth University, Brisbane, Australia, see; indicatorloops.com/caldecott_gravestone.jpg
"A Church History of Travancore" by Agur
